jobDescription: Data ScientistThis is an exciting opportunity to join a cutting-edge healthcare company. The ideal candidate is a strong data scientist with a strong grasp on machine learning techniques and strong software development skills preferably with Python or R.Responsibilities:Build and optimize predictive models using machine learning and other algorithmsBuild, optimize and quickly decipher patterns within large quantity of data and to reference key characteristics using visualization techniquesExperience with predictive models, data-driven analysis and application of machine learning algorithmsWrite code (Python) to perform online stream processing and offline batch processing from a data lake and relational databasesDemonstrating strong programming skills in large-scale data analysis SQL, R & PythonLeveraging strong math skills and statistical knowledge to advanced data mining and data analysis activitiesPresent results clearly in written and verbal formCreate automated anomaly detection software to constantly track performanceInterface with product managers and other business groups to formulate requirements and suggest creative solutions for analytics features and functionalityUphold best practices around development processes, coding, and peer reviewsFully test algorithms and code to ensure the highest level of credibility, reliability, and maintainabilityRequirements:Experience developing machine learning algorithmsExperience writing code in modern general-purpose programming languages (Python)Well versed manipulating a relational database using SQLExcellent understanding of supervised learning (regression, SVM, neural networks, decision forests, etc.) and unsupervised learning (clustering, PCA, etc.)The ability to adeptly write core PythonStrong academic foundation in probability theory, statistics, and applied mathematicsKnowledge of software engineering best practices
